response.overview: Two words that describe Ryan are sassy and gassy. He works by day as a middle school theatre teacher. He was awarded the 2018 Teaching Star of the Year winner by the Utah Middle School Teachers Association. His comedy comes a variety of sources; from growing up with two deaf parents, to asking for the details on the latest girl drama at his school, as well as his inability to stop talking about himself, it's his favorite subject.
response.title: Ryan Erwin: Vertical Claps
